thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Yum! Brands Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.96

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yum! Brands Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.96
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Yum Brands:
* YUM! BRANDS REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER GAAP OPERATING PROFIT GROWTH OF 134%; FOURTH-QUARTER CORE OPERATING PROFIT DECLINE OF (6)%; ON TRACK WITH STRATEGIC TRANSFORMATION TO ACCELERATE GROWTH
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.96 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.26 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $1,577 MILLION * QTRLY WORLDWIDE SYSTEM SALES GREW 4%, WITH KFC AT 6%, TACO BELL AT 3% AND PIZZA HUT AT 1%, EXCLUDING 53RD WEEK
* DURING Q4, RECORDED ONE-TIME CHARGE OF $434 MILLION RELATED TO THE TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
